text: The men's hammer throw event at the 1991 Summer Universiade was held at the Don Valley Stadium in Sheffield with the final on 20 July 1991. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Ken Flax '''' |Valeriy Gubkin '''' |Heinz Weis '''' |} ==Results== ===Qualification=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;font-size:95%" |- !
